metadata.title: CVE-2020-25659 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
python-cryptography 3.2 is vulnerable to Bleichenbacher timing attacks inthe RSA decryption API, via timed processing of valid PKCS#1 v1.5ciphertext.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-cryptography - 2.1.4-1ubuntu1.4
python3-cryptography - 2.1.4-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-cryptography package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.4-1ubuntu1.4').
